activities: Review of information collected from company owned and operated websites. Information from e-mails sent. Information concerning prospective, current, and former employees in Europe of CryoLife's subsidiary. Information concerning receipents of our tissues and products.

recoursemech: For human resources data: EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC); For all other types of data: American Arbitration Association (AAA)
